# Python Example

This example demonstrates running Python code in the browser using Pyodide.


```{pyodide}
#| exercise: ex_1_py
#| check: true
n = range(1, 11)
mean = sum(n)/len(n)
feedback = None
if (result == mean):
  feedback = { "correct": True, "message": "Nice work!" }
else:
  feedback = { "correct": False, "message": "That's incorrect, sorry." }
feedback
```

This is then not working anymore.
